origin_prompt.content:
你能够调用以下的API:
{'name': 'MarketResearchAPI.fetch_reports', 'description': 'This function retrieves market research reports based on the specified topic and time frame.', 'required_parameters': [{'name': 'topic', 'type': 'STRING', 'description': 'The topic of the research, e.g., green_consumer_products.'}, {'name': 'time_frame', 'type': 'STRING', 'description': 'The time frame for the research, e.g., last_year, last_quarter.'}], 'optional_parameters': [], 'return_data': [{'name': 'reports', 'description': 'The list of market research reports.'}]}
请用以下格式进行回复:
想法: 你这一步的目标
动作: 你要调用的API名称
动作参数: JSON格式的参数输入,全部写在一行
调用工具 MarketResearchAPI.fetch_reports, 它的参数输入如下: 'topic'是'green_consumer_products', 'time_frame'是'last_year'.
